dialog: Raju, a humble village boy wearing a simple cotton shirt and dhoti, dreams of a better life for his family.
He leaves home with little money but big ambition, determined to build a successful business in the city.
Through hard work and smart choices, Raju launches a startup that quickly grows into a thriving enterprise.
Years later, Raju becomes a millionaire. He returns with gifts and love, surprising his humble parents.
Raju proudly retires his parents; they relax in a new house, grateful for the son who changed their destiny.
